title: Independent Hong Kong news outlet Citizen News shuts down over safety fears
content:
1. Independent Hong Kong news outlet Citizen News shuts down over safety fears  CNN
  2. Another independent Hong Kong site halts production out of fear for 'safety and well-being' of staff  Fox News
  3. Hong Kong's Citizen News to shut down  Reuters
  4. Third Pro-Democracy News Outlet to Close in Hong Kong During Security Law Fears  Bloomberg
  5. Hong Kong's Citizen News to close, amid fears for staff's safety  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
